attributes.action: Stop the increase council tax for services that we don't get
attributes.additional_details: Bins collection once a fortnight uneven paths pot holes in the road
attributes.background: Am a taxi driver and I drop off a elderly lady outside her house at midnight the lights had gone off and because see couldn't see her garden she tripped over and broke her arm

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
